predicate.note: Frames file for 'telephone' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 37.4, no mention of other members. Comparison to 'call'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Big Board stock specialists, in a bold palace revolt, began shortly after Oct. 13 *trace* to telephone the corporate executives of the companies whose stock is listed on the Big Board to have them pressure the exchange to ban program trading.
example.arg: the corporate executives of the companies whose stock is listed on the Big Board
to have them pressure the exchange to ban program trading
